2024-06-02.name: Mayonaka Punch
2024-06-02.desc:
Meet Masaki, the now former member of the popular NewTuber group, Harikiri Sisters. After a career setback, aka getting fired unexpectedly via a livestream, she joins forces with Live, a partner with superhuman abilities. Together, they aim to create sensational content and reach 1 million subscribers. Will they reach their content dreams or be hit with the block button?

Source: Crunchyroll

Note: The first two episodes received an advance release on Kadokawa's YouTube channel on June 2, 2024. The regular TV broadcast started on July 8, 2024.

2024-06-05.name: Jintian de Wancan Jiushi Ni
2024-06-05.desc:
In the world of mountains and seas, there exists a class of creatures called "foreign beasts". The beasts can evolve into demons by cultivating and gaining spiritual knowledge. However, due to the turmoil in history, humans and demons have always been in a state of hostility. Mo Bai, as the eldest disciple of the immortal cultivation sect Tian Ji Sect, is gifted but does not cultivate immortality properly, and only wants to eat all the food in the world. In this journey, he inadvertently discovers the secret of the human-demon turmoil in the past. ......

source: bgm.tv/DeepL

2024-06-07.name: Gekijou Soushuuhen Bocchi the Rock!
2024-06-07.desc: * Based on a music slice of life manga by Hamaji Aki.

2024-06-08.name: Cong Gu Huo Niao Kaishi: Long Cheng Fengyun
2024-06-08.desc:
Li Yan, a gifted martial arts practitioner, is suffering from a terminal illness and has only a few months to live. He meets a man who calls himself "Tapir" and is sent to a fruit of the "Yanfu Fruit Tree". Li Yan must complete three quests issued by the system within the time limit, and earn money through boxing matches in exchange for YANFU points in order to buy a potion that can cure a terminal illness. As he learns more about the Dragon Abyss Walled City, Li Yan is gradually drawn into the disputes within the Walled City, and also discovers that there are other YANFU walkers competing with him in the shadows.

source: bgm.tv/DeepL.com

2024-06-08.name: Katsute Mahou Shoujo to Aku wa Tekitai Shite Ita.
2024-06-08.desc: Note: The first two episodes received an advance release on Z-aN on June 8, 2024. Additionally, the first three episodes received an early screening on July 4, 2024 at Anime Expo in Los Angeles. The regular TV broadcast started on July 9, 2024.

2024-06-08.name: Maarui Kanojo to Zannen na Kareshi

2024-06-10.name: Jin Can Wangshi
2024-06-10.desc:
Lu Zuo, an ordinary young man who originally worked in a shop in Dongguan, accidentally obtained the powerful power of golden silkworm from his grandmother during a trip back to his hometown to visit his relatives. However, conspiracies and struggles surrounding the golden silkworm emerged one after another. How should Lu Zuo, who was involved in the disputes in Taoism and magic, respond?

source: movie.douban.com/googletranslate

2024-06-12.name: Tianting Ban Zhuan Xia
2024-06-12.desc:
Li Ji, a genius student in the Department of Architecture, is abducted by an alien creature called Dark Kirin and taken to a secret realm called Po Nian Space. In the secret realm is the ruins of the ancient heaven. Dark Kirin tells him that if he wants to go back, he must pass the test of heaven, and this test is to rebuild the heaven...

source: bgm.tv/googletranslate

2024-06-13.name: Shi Wangzhe A? Di 3 Ji: Youqiubiying Xingzhi Dui
2024-06-13.desc:
In the mysterious oriental fantasy world, Jixia Academy, as the highest institution of learning in the King's Continent, attracts many students. Here, a group called "Star Team" is a special existence, but they are facing disbandment for some reason. In an accidental help to a schoolmate to solve a mechanical problem, the members of the Star Team used their respective expertise to assist in the battle and resolve the crisis. Captain Yao once again called on the team members to regroup and set off to form a "reply to every request" mutual aid group to help their classmates on campus solve various problems. This season's story unfolds with the "Star Team", combining the big and small things on the Jixia campus, showing the members' funny and healing daily lives, as well as the precious friendship bonds.

source: bgm.tv/googletranslate

2024-06-14.name: Cheng He Titong
2024-06-14.desc:
Yu Wanyin transmigrated into a novel about palace fighting. The female protagonist of the novel was also transmigrated into the novel. In order to reverse her fate as a villain, Yu Wanyin chose to join forces with a tyrant. Unexpectedly, the tyrant was also a transmigrant into the novel. Yu Wanyin hopes that the three modern people can put aside their palace fights and sit together to fight landlords and eat hot pot. However, the female protagonist believes that she is the chosen one, and still chooses to stand against the male protagonist Duan Wang's team. Yu Wanyin has to carry out a series of actions in order to survive and help Daxia avoid the drought crisis...

Source: iqiyi.com

2024-06-21.name: Gintama on Theater 2D: Ikkoku Keisei Hen

2024-06-22.name: Rising Impact
2024-06-22.desc:
Nanaumi Gawain is a third-grader with an incredible love for baseball and making the ball really fly. In a chance encounter with a female professional golfer, Nishino Kiria, he learns that golf will allow him to hit a ball further than any other sport.

Using his physical strength and keen observational skills gained from living in a rural mountain area, he manages to hit the ball to such an impressive distance that it rivals even that of professionals. With Kiria's help, the new golf enthusiast enrolls at Camelot Academy, a prestigious school for both skilled and aspiring golfers from around the world. Gawain wants to be the best professional golfer in the world but there are other golf prodigies with extraordinary skills that stand in his way and he has to face various trials to overcome them.

Source: Netflix

2024-06-23.name: Gimai Seikatsu
2024-06-23.desc:
* Based on a love comedy light novel series written by Mikawa Ghost and illustrated by Hiten.

From classmates to brother and sister, living under the same roof.

After his father's remarriage, Asamura Yuuta ends up getting a new stepsister, coincidentally the number one beauty of the school year, Ayase Saki. Having learned important values when it comes to man-woman relationships through the previous ones of their parents, they promise each other not to be too close, not to be too opposing, and to merely keep a vague and comfortable distance. On one hand, Saki, who has worked in solitude for the sake of her family, doesn't know how to properly rely on others, whereas Yuuta is unsure of how to really treat her. Standing on fairly equal ground, these two slowly learn the comfortable sensation of living together.

Source: M-U

Note: The first episode received an early screening at a special event on May 2, 2024 in Tokyo. Additionally, the first three episodes received an advance screening on Kadokawa's YouTube channel on June 23, 2024. The regular TV broadcast started on July 4, 2024.

2024-06-26.name: Maou Gun Saikyou no Majutsushi wa Ningen Datta
2024-06-26.desc:
Ike is a powerful magician and the leader of the Immortal Brigade, part of the Seventh Corps of the Demon Lord's Army. He single-handedly conquers fortresses and pushes back the armies of humanity. Neither Dairokuten, the Demon Lord, nor Ike's loyal soldiers know his darkest secret—he is a human in hiding! But can he keep his secret safe and bring peaceful coexistence to demons and humans?

Source: Crunchyroll

Note: The first two episodes received an early screening at a special event on June 16, 2024 at Shinjuku Piccadilly in Tokyo. The regular broadcast started on June 26, 2024.

2024-06-27.name: Isekai Suicide Squad
2024-06-27.desc:
In the crime-ridden city of Gotham, Amanda Waller, the head of A.R.G.U.S., has assembled a group of notorious criminals for a mission: Harley Quinn, Deadshot, Peacemaker, Clayface, and King Shark. These Super-Villains are sent into an otherworldly realm that's connected to this world through a gate. It's a world of swords and magic where orcs rampage and dragons rule the skies—an "ISEKAI"!

With lethal explosives planted in their necks, there's no running or hiding, and failing the mission means a one-way ticket to the afterlife! Can Harley Quinn and her crew conquer this perilous ISEKAI realm?!

Source: Warner Bros. Japan

Note: The weekly streaming began on June 27, with the first three episodes, on Max and Hulu in the United States and other overseas streaming services. The regular TV broadcast in Japan started on July 6.

2024-06-28.name: Eiga Sore Ike! Anpanman: Baikinman to Ehon no Lulun

2024-06-29.name: Atri: My Dear Moments
2024-06-29.desc:
* Based on a visual novel game developed by Frontwing and Makura (枕) and published by Aniplex.exe.

In the near future, a sudden and unexplained sea rise has left much of human civilization underwater. Ikaruga Natsuki, a boy who lost his mother and his leg in an accident some years earlier, returns disillusioned from a harsh life in the big city to find his old countryside home half-swallowed by the sea. Left without a family, all he has to his name is the ship and submarine left to him by his oceanologist grandmother, and her debts. His only hope to restore the dreams for the future that he has lost is to take up an opportunity presented to him by the suspicious debt collector Catherine. They set sail to search the sunken ruins of his grandmother's laboratory in order to find a treasure rumor says she left there. But what they find is not riches or jewels; it is a strange girl lying asleep in a coffin at the bottom of the sea. Atri. Atri is a robot, but her appearance and her wealth of emotions would fool anyone into think she's a living, breathing human being. In gratitude for being salvaged, she makes a declaration to Natsuki.
"I want to fulfil my master's final order. Until I do, I'll be your leg!"
In a little town slowly being enveloped by the ocean, an unforgettable summer is about to begin for this boy and this mysterious robot girl...

Source: Official Game Website

Note: The first episode received an early screening at a special event on June 16, 2024 at Animate Sapporo and four additional Animate venues. Additionally, the first two episodes received an early screening at a special event on June 23, 2024 at United Cinemas Aqua City Odaiba in Tokyo. Further, the first episode received an advance release on Docomo Anime Store on June 29, 2024. The regular TV broadcast started on July 14, 2024.

2024-06-29.name: Boku no Tsuma wa Kanjou ga Nai
2024-06-29.desc:
* Based on a romantic manga by Sugiura Jirou.

Takuma is a single guy who does nothing but go to work and come home. Too tired to do chores, he decides to get a robot to cook and keep house. "Mina-chan" is such a good housekeeper, Takuma jokes that she should become his wife. Mina takes Takuma's joke seriously, and slowly the two start doing more things together, like having a picnic outside. As time goes by, Takuma starts to fall for Mina, but can a human and a robot ever have an equal, loving relationship?

Source: Seven Seas Entertainment

2024-06-29.name: Hari Maware! Koinu (2024)
2024-06-29.desc: Note: The first episode received an advance release on TV Tokyo on June 29, 2024. The regular TV broadcast started on July 6,2024.
